accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the multi-agent system.

completeness.description: The degree to which all necessary steps were completed to arrive at the final answer.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logic and reasoning process of the multi-agent system.

efficiency.description: The number of steps taken to arrive at the answer relative to the least number of steps possible.

reliability.description: The consistency of the system in providing accurate answers across various questions.

diversity_handling.description: The system's ability to handle a wide range of question types and difficulties.

data_contamination_control.description: The measures taken to avoid using contaminated data or easily accessible answers from the internet.

time_taken.description: The total time required to produce the final answer from the initial question.

resource_utilization.description: The amount of computational or other resources used by the system to produce an answer.

user_satisfaction.description: The level of satisfaction of the user with the provided answer and explanation.
